casebody.data:
Jamie LEMONS, Adm'r, et al., respondents,
v.
MARSHALL BROWNING HOSPITAL ASSOCIATION, etc., et al., petitioners. No. 123812 Supreme Court of Illinois. September 26, 2018

Petition for Leave to Appeal Denied.

In the exercise of this Court's supervisory authority, the Appellate Court, Fifth District, is directed to vacate its order in Lemons v. Marshall Browning Hospital Ass'n, case No. 5-18-0290 (06/22/18), denying leave to appeal. The appellate court is instructed to allow leave to appeal and *874consider the forum non conveniens issue on the merits.
